body_html: Hi, I tried to run your script to reproduce the issue. To make it work, I added num_classes=10,dropout=False to the I3DR50() call. Then it errors at self.avgpool(x) due to RuntimeError: invalid argument 2: input image (T: 4 H: 5 W: 5) smaller than kernel size (kT: 4 kH: 7 kW: 7). Could you check that you can successfully run the script?

body: Hi, I tried to run your script to reproduce the issue. To make it work, I added `num_classes=10,dropout=False` to the `I3DR50()` call. Then it errors at `self.avgpool(x)` due to `RuntimeError: invalid argument 2: input image (T: 4 H: 5 W: 5) smaller than kernel size (kT: 4 kH: 7 kW: 7)`. Could you check that you can successfully run the script?
